Reason: The _transientMode configuration option in the prevayler software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value significantly impacts system performance. When _transientMode is enabled, the system operates in a transient mode where data is not persisted to disk, leading to faster execution times and lower memory consumption. On the other hand, disabling _transientMode causes data to be persisted to disk, resulting in slower execution times and higher memory consumption. Therefore, the value of _transientMode directly affects system performance, making it a performance-sensitive configuration option.
